original_text: He put together all his animals and everything that he had received in Paddan Aram. He took them with him to go to the land of Canaan. He left to go back to his father Isaac.
korean_text: 그 모은 바 모든 가축과 모든 소유물 곧 그가 밧단아람에서 모은 가축을 이끌고 가나안 땅에 있는 그의 아버지 이삭에게로 가려 할새

sentences.original_text: He put together all his animals
and everything that he had received in Paddan Aram
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 판단 아람에서 받은 모든 것들을

sentences.original_text: to go to the land of Canaan
